dcterms:description: A corpus of Chinese noun phrases (NPs) annotated with their plurality and definiteness, constructed from a large-scale English-Chinese parallel corpus.
dcterms:title: Chinese Noun Phrases Corpus

dcterms:description: A dataset containing English and Chinese sentence pairs derived from TV episode subtitles, used for linguistic analysis and model training.
dcterms:title: TV Episode Subtitle Corpus

dcterms:description: A parallel corpus containing aligned English and Chinese sentences, used for training models to predict plurality and definiteness in Chinese noun phrases.
dcterms:title: English-Chinese Parallel Corpus
